 
 
                                                                                                                      
Interruption of 
Electricity Supply 
Notice is hereby given under rule 27 of the Electric Power Rules 
That the electricity supply will be interrupted as here under: 
(It is necessary to interrupt supply periodically in order to facilitate 
maintenance and upgrade of power lines to the network; to connect new 
 customers or to replace power lines during road construction, etc.) 
 NAIROBI REGION 
AREA: PART OF MATOPENI 
DATE: Wednesday 15.09.2021                        TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Twiga Police Post, Part of Matopeni Est, Part of Spring Valley Kayole & 
  adjacent customers. 
AREA: PART OF JOSKA FEEDER EX RUAI 
DATE: Wednesday 15.09.2021                        TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Ruai Shopping Centre, Ruai Police Stn, Ruai DC Offices, Githunguri 
Est, Quickmart Supermarket, Mwamba Est, Block 10 Est, Makongeni Est, 
Stage 26, Twin Bird Est, Kipawa Est, Made in the Street Est, Kingoris Est, 
Kamulu Town, Reflector Est, Patnet Steel, Brookshine Sch, Ngundu & 
  adjacent customers.  
AREA: HIGHRISE 
DATE: Wednesday 15.09.2021                       TIME:  9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Daystar, City Mortuary, Part of KNH, KMTC, Mbagathi Hosp, War Memorial 
Hosp, Umash Funeral Home, Highrise Est, Riara University, Magiwa Est, 
Peace Junior Sch, Shadrack Kimalel Sch, Sunshine Sch & adjacent 
  customers.

Interruption of 
Electricity Supply 
Notice is hereby given under rule 27 of the Electric Power Rules 
That the electricity supply will be interrupted as here under: 
(It is necessary to interrupt supply periodically in order to facilitate 
maintenance and upgrade of power lines to the network; to connect new 
  customers or to replace power lines during road construction, etc.) 
AREA:  PARTS OF NGOINGWA, MAKWA, NG’ETHU 
DATE: Thursday 16.09.2021                             TIME: 7.00 A.M. - 5.00 P.M. 
Ngoingwa Classic, White Sisters, Kilimambogo Millers, Mpesa Academy, 
 Mwea, Ng’ethu Waterworks, Gakui, Makwa & adjacent customers. 
AREA: KWA MBIRA, LIMURU TOWN, THIGIO, KAMIRITHU 
DATE: Thursday 16.09.2021                            TIME: 7.00 A.M. - 5.00 P.M. 
Part of Limuru Town, Whole of Kwa Mbira, Thigio, Ndeiya, Rwacumari, 
Ndioni, Ruamburi, Part of Rironi. Kamandura, Gatarakwa, Ndeiya Tarabana 
  & adjacent customers. 
 COAST REGION 
PARTS OF MOMBASA COUNTY 
AREA: PART OF MIRITINI 
DATE: Thursday 16.09.2021                            TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Miritni Achievers Acdaemy, Miritini Complex Sec & Pri Schs, Kwa Mama Sec 
 Sch, Fortune Container Depot & adjacent customers.

       Smocky Hill & adjacent customers. 
 
 
                                                                                  
 
 
For further information, contact 
 The nearest Kenya Power office 
Interruption Notices may be viewed at 
www.kplc.co.ke
